text: Existential Failure So I ve been working for this company  been with this guy  and pursued graduate education for five years  and I m just not convinced it makes sense to continue with any of it  I work full time and pursue a doctoral degree part time  my SO works nearly full time and pursues a bachelor s degree full time  When I m at work  I wish the ground would swallow me up  I work with kids with autism and despite support via training I am saturated with sadness for their families and frustration with the progress I can effect  When I m at home  I simultaneously loathe the mess and wish I had any energy to clean it up  or money to hire someone to do it for me  I am a terrible girlfriend  I live with my SO  but we have sex once a month max  It s an effort for me   he s hot and I love him  but it s just that I don t want sex  in general  with anyone  I feel like I have hit a wall and have kept slamming my head against it for the past   months or more   If there were a button I could push and end things  I would  no questions asked  I know family and SO would be deeply saddended but I feel like it would be the right thing to do  I ve done research and options are not available  too expensive  too risky  or too ballsy  Reddit  what do you tell yourselves in times like these to lift yourselves out of  or make peace with  this shitty place  Do you even   Just keep swimming    just not cutting it
summary: I work full time and pursue a doctoral degree part time, while my partner works full-time and pursues a bachelor's degree full time. I work with kids with autism and I'm frustrated with the progress they make. I live with my partner, but we have sex once a month max.

text: I d like to wish goodluck to everyone who  like me  is getting their Leaving Cert results today  Today is the big day  the day of our nightmares  the day we wish for  but dread simultaneously I d like to remind everyone  no matter your grade  class rank  or overall points  it s not a reflection of who  you  are as a person  nor is it make or break in regards to your future  No matter your chosen CAO course  apprenticeship or any other formal education  the results of today bears no impact on your ability to persue the aforementioned education paths You may log on at  am and be dissapointed  or you may log on and be enthused  but if you distegard every other word in this post  remember these   today s result doesn t reflect on you as a person or how your teacher remembers you   Despite not wanting to rank students  and grade them on things we mistook as irrelevant  they had to  So whether you come out with a H  or an O  the teacher will remember your participation  your cooperation and your respective attitudes  for better or worse   The teacher will remember who you are as a person  and hold that to a higher esteem than your  calculated  grade   Don t be disheartened by what you see today  there is  always  another path  Whether you get your  st   th or even  th course  there is ALWAYS another way in  I read a post from a user who had recieved   points  and they took a course  akin to BIFE I believe  and after which they got into  presumably  their prior first choice which was nearly an ADDITIONAL   points above their LC points   So whether you re   or   points away from your desired course  just remember you CAN achieve it  you CAN succeed  and you CAN be successful   All you need is the motivation and will to succeed Goodluck to everyone  I wish you all future prosperity  and every subsequent sucess possible TL DR R rimjobsteve wholesomeness  Obligatory apology for mobile formatting and haste in writing  I am en route to work
summary: Today is the big day when students get their Leaving Certificates. The teacher will remember who you are as a person more than your grade. There is always another way to get the results you want and you can be successful.
cleaned: today big day student leave certificate teacher remember person grade way result want successful

text: Everything s bullshitI m so fucking over this  Everything  Being alive  I feel like I m being held hostage in my own body  There s  n o t h i n g  to live for so why do I have to pretend like i care about life anymore  I ve been given chance after chance to turn things around and make things better  And I burn through every single one like I m trying to beat my high score for how quickly can I sabotage myself this time  I m out of chances  I m out of options and it s my own fault because I do it to myself   It s not a matter of if  it s when  Because I WILL kill myself the first chance i get  if nothing else gets to me first  I m constantly going back and forth  trying to figure out if it s more selfish for me to kill myself now and get it out of the way for my family  or stay alive and keep slowly draining their time  money and emotions  They give and they give because they don t want to believe that I m really this fucking worthless  and I just suck it in like a black hole   I ve come to the conclusion that I have to wait until my mother and sibling die before I can kill myself  It s hard to think about because I want them to live long  happy lives  but I want to get out of here as soon as I can  I just feel so bad for them because they really believe that I have the potential to have any kind of life worth living  to be any kind of person worth taking up space  It s sad to watch them lie to themselves  desperately trying to believe that I have some kind of value   I haven t been emotional about the thought of suicide in years  I m just waiting it out  I ve lost all interest in being alive  and apparently I stopped trying to live a long time ago  I never want to hurt the people I love  but sometimes I wish I could just do something to make them hate me so that I could run off and kill myself without anyone noticing
summary: Everything is a waste of time for me. I want to kill myself. I have to wait for my mother and sibling to die before I can do it. I don't want to hurt the people I love, but sometimes I wish they hate me.
cleaned: waste time want kill wait mother sible die not want hurt people love wish hate
